message.body: Basic questions: if I get to a green portal, should I hack it or do anything else? If a green person owns it, does it hurt them if I hack it?
Hack everything, green or blue! Hacking green portals won't give you AP (points) but it still gives you items. And no it doesn't hurt anything
One thing to keep in mind: hacking a portal that's much higher level than you will zap your xm pretty fast and will give you items you can't use until yo
u reach that level. So when you're low level it's best to try to find low level portals to hack
Hmm ok! How do I know what level it is? And thanks for the crash course!
No problem! And when you click on the portal there should be an L with a number on the top right. That's the current portal level
Ok! How do I get more xm and how do I know if I should deploy a resonator?
Xm is the little blue dots you see on the ground, especially near portals. You'll suck it up as your scanner circle crosses over it. It's tougher to find
in the burbs though! And at this point in the game you should pretty much be deploying resonators whenever you're able. It's the fastest way to level yo
urself up. We can get into more strategy as you move up in the game :)
Interesting! Ok I'll see what I find around here and in Vermont
Today's questions: recharging resonators when I can is a good thing? What do I do with a portal key? I have 2!
Yes you can and should recharge resonators whenever you can - it helps the team and gives you AP! Keys let you recharge portals remotely (if you don't ha
ve a key for a portal you can only recharge when you're physically at it) and also let you link portals together. You need a key to the destination porta
l (but not the origin portal) to make a link. Keep in mind that creating a link will use up the key for the destination portal though!
Ok thanks! Why do I want to link portals? Also how do I get my name on one? #sexyambition
The overall goal of the game is to capture "mind units" by linking portals together to make fields. If you link three portals together in a triangle, you
capture all the MUs within it for the team and yourself
Ah ok!
And when you capture a neutral (gray) portal by placing the first resonator on it, you gain ownership of it until the other team destroys it
You can also submit new portals. I'll explain that more next time I see you. It takes forever to get them approved so don't worry about it for now
Got it. Also it told me someone hit me and I lost 100xm! What the fuck. Can I hit them back?
Ha ha. That means a blue portal attacked you, probably when you tried to hack it. Portals owned by the opposite faction can attack you when you hack or a
ttack them
Shit!! I should hack them anyway though right?
Yes, absolutely!
It's ON
And when you start collecting enough bursters (xmp) in your inventory, you can start attacking lower level blue portals yourself. If you can neutralize t
hem to gray, you can capture them for yourself,
Just don't bother attacking anything high level right now because it'll attack back like crazy and zap all your xm
Cool! Yeah most of what I've encountered today have been level 1 (although they have like 7 level 1 resonators and 1 level 7 resonator?) so I've been hackin em up
Where are you at today?
Pa to ny to Vermont! I got portal keys in Ottsville pa & Catskill ny. What if I get one in Vermont and link them all??
Go for it if you can. Level one portals don't have big link distances though, so it may not work
I'll see what I can do!
